actor_awards.notes: A celebrated tenor and Hollywood star whose career was brief but influential. His portrayal of Enrico Caruso was a massive box office success. He received two Stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame (one for Motion Pictures, one for Recording).

filmography.title: The Great Caruso
filmography.role_description: Lanza portrays the legendary Italian tenor Enrico Caruso, following his rise from a Naples choirboy to international opera stardom.
filmography.plot: The life and career of the famous opera singer Enrico Caruso, featuring many of the arias that made him famous.

filmography.title: That Midnight Kiss
filmography.role_description: A singing truck driver who is discovered by a wealthy debutante and partnered with her in an opera production.
filmography.plot: A Philadelphia socialite discovers a truck driver with a beautiful voice and helps him launch an operatic career.

filmography.title: The Toast of New Orleans
filmography.role_description: A rough bayou fisherman with a golden voice who falls for an opera soprano and learns refinement.
filmography.plot: A rough-and-tumble bayou fisherman is discovered by an opera director and groomed for the stage, falling for the prima donna in the process.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Original Song ('Be My Love')

filmography.title: Serenade
filmography.role_description: A vineyard worker who rises to operatic fame but is emotionally manipulated by a wealthy socialite.
filmography.plot: A farm worker becomes an opera singer, but his career is threatened when he falls in love with the wrong woman.

filmography.title: Because You're Mine
filmography.role_description: An opera singer who gets drafted into the army and falls for the sergeant's sister.
filmography.plot: A famous opera singer is drafted into the US Army, where he has trouble adjusting until he meets a sergeant's sister.

filmography.title: Seven Hills of Rome
filmography.role_description: An American TV singer who travels to Rome in search of his jet-setting fiancée but finds new romance.
filmography.plot: An American singer follows his girlfriend to Rome, only to find himself jobless and broke until he finds success and a new love.

filmography.title: For the First Time
filmography.role_description: A temperamental opera star who finds redemption and love with a deaf German girl.
filmography.plot: An opera singer with a bad reputation flees to Capri, where he falls in love with a deaf girl and tries to help her regain her hearing.

filmography.title: Winged Victory
filmography.role_description: A minor role as a singer in the chorus in this wartime drama (Lanza's film debut).
filmography.plot: The training and combat experiences of a group of recruits in the US Army Air Forces during World War II.
